Author: Bigfatbeech
Text: Don't worry, mine was a very large and mean woman dubbed by the whole town as "cave woman" due to her appearance and it still hurt just as much.  It'll get better. The sadness will leave bit by bit until you can look back and not feel any pain about it. :)

Author: llama1122
Text: Wow, I'm so sorry!!!   I remember meeting the girl my ex cheated on me with (she was at our place....) and that was such a horrible experience. And it was only once.   I feel for you, ugh, that's awful
